mapper.insert: insert into base_country (id, code, name, name_en, local_currency_code, publish_currency_code, continent, continent_en, created_date, modified_date, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{localCurrencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{publishCurrencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{continentEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update base_country set code = #{code,jdbcType=CHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_en = #{nameEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, local_currency_code = #{localCurrencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, publish_currency_code = #{publishCurrencyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, continent = #{continent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, continent_en = #{continentEn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_date = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modified_date = #{modifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, code, name, name_en, local_currency_code, publish_currency_code, continent, continent_en, created_date, modified_date, status from base_country where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
